text: Charles Matthew "Chuck" Geschke (September 11, 1939 â€“ April 16, 2021) was an American businessman and computer scientist. He was best known for founding the graphics and publishing software company Adobe Inc. with John Warnock in 1982, and co-creating the PDF document format. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American computer scientists Category:Businesspeople from Cleveland Category:Scientists from Cleveland Category:Cancer deaths in California
